Class RadianceOfXAndYAndZAndThetaAndPhiDetector

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Detectors

Vts.dll

Implements IDetector. Tally for Radiance(x,y,z). Note: this tally currently only works with discrete absorption weighting and analog

public class RadianceOfXAndYAndZAndThetaAndPhiDetector : Detector, IHistoryDetector, IDetector
